attributes.action: Call a General election at the earliest possible opportunity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the recent blunders of the government (including how they dealt with the Northern rock crisis, borrowing money they are unlikely to ever see again but at the same time allowing the ex-director to walk away with a £2 million retirement fund. And losing approximately 1/2 the population's private and sensitive date including N.I numbers, date of births and banking details) the undersigned petition the Prime minister to call a General election as so as it is possible. The Great British Public are being subjected to an incompetent government whose leader they never voted into power. We supposedly live in a democratic nation, so we call the prime minister to allow democracy to prevail by allowing us to choose our great nations leader (before we become a not-so-great nation)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
